translation.Message_0_Page_0: Mixture of timing, coincidences... we didn't know eachother before. Well I think Amber and Viola knew eachother but that seems about it. From what I remember, early on Grandma Cherry met Alexander out on the road and they started traveling in his RV, then they found Owen.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: After a few months into the apocalypse, Amber and Viola met Terrya, and then they met up with Grandma Cherry and Alexander out on the road. I then met Mar-... ...You know what, the details don't really matter.
